name: swetrix
description: Swetrix is a privacy-focused web analytics platform that can be self-hosted or used as SaaS. It tracks visits without cookies and displays insights in a clean dashboard.
features: Privacy-focused analytics: Tracks website visitors without cookies or personal data.
Real-time dashboard: Displays live visitor data and page views as they happen.
Event tracking: Monitors custom events like button clicks and form submissions.
Performance monitoring: Measures page load times and Core Web Vitals.
Traffic sources: Identifies referrers, UTM campaigns, and traffic channels.
Geographic data: Shows visitor locations by country and region.
Device analytics: Breaks down traffic by device type, browser, and OS.
Custom properties: Tracks custom dimensions for advanced segmentation.
API access: Queries analytics data programmatically via REST API.
Email reports: Sends periodic analytics summaries via email.
Multiple websites: Manages analytics for unlimited websites from one account.
GDPR compliant: Respects privacy regulations without requiring cookie consent.
